parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the environment to update.

parameters.name: maintenanceWindow
parameters.description: A specification for a time window to apply software updates. An option to select the default or custom maintenance window. startTimeHour (integer) --- The hour for the maintenance window start ( 00- 23). startTimeMinute (integer) --- The minutes past the hour for the maintenance window start ( 00- 59). endTimeHour (integer) --- The hour for the maintenance window end ( 00- 23). endTimeMinute (integer) --- The minutes for the maintenance window end ( 00- 59). daysOfTheWeek (list) --- The days of the week during which the maintenance window is open. (string) --- applyTimeOf (string) --- The option to set the maintenance window during the device local time or Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: An option to select the default or custom maintenance window.

nested_params.name: startTimeHour
nested_params.description: The hour for the maintenance window start ( 00- 23).

nested_params.name: startTimeMinute
nested_params.description: The minutes past the hour for the maintenance window start ( 00- 59).

nested_params.name: endTimeHour
nested_params.description: The hour for the maintenance window end ( 00- 23).

nested_params.name: endTimeMinute
nested_params.description: The minutes for the maintenance window end ( 00- 59).

nested_params.name: daysOfTheWeek
nested_params.description: The days of the week during which the maintenance window is open.

nested_params.name: applyTimeOf
nested_params.description: The option to set the maintenance window during the device local time or Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

parameters.name: deviceCreationTags
parameters.description: A map of the key-value pairs of the tag or tags to assign to the newly created devices for this environment. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: environment
nested_items.description: Describes an environment.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the environment.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the environment.

nested_items.name: desktopArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the desktop to stream from Amazon WorkSpaces, WorkSpaces Secure Browser, or AppStream 2.0.

nested_items.name: desktopEndpoint
nested_items.description: The URL for the identity provider login (only for environments that use AppStream 2.0).

nested_items.name: desktopType
nested_items.description: The type of streaming desktop for the environment.

nested_items.name: activationCode
nested_items.description: The activation code to register a device to the environment.

nested_items.name: softwareSetUpdateSchedule
nested_items.description: An option to define if software updates should be applied within a maintenance window.

nested_items.name: maintenanceWindow
nested_items.description: A specification for a time window to apply software updates.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: An option to select the default or custom maintenance window.

nested_items.name: startTimeHour
nested_items.description: The hour for the maintenance window start ( 00- 23).

nested_items.name: startTimeMinute
nested_items.description: The minutes past the hour for the maintenance window start ( 00- 59).

nested_items.name: endTimeHour
nested_items.description: The hour for the maintenance window end ( 00- 23).

nested_items.name: endTimeMinute
nested_items.description: The minutes for the maintenance window end ( 00- 59).

nested_items.name: daysOfTheWeek
nested_items.description: The days of the week during which the maintenance window is open.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: applyTimeOf
nested_items.description: The option to set the maintenance window during the device local time or Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: softwareSetUpdateMode
nested_items.description: An option to define which software updates to apply.

nested_items.name: desiredSoftwareSetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the software set to apply.

nested_items.name: pendingSoftwareSetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the software set that is pending to be installed.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the environment was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the device was updated.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the environment.
